meta.name: Kiu Yip Newborn photography / Q姐姐
meta.about:
Perhaps it is the first one Cantonese channel who’s specialized in newborn and family photography.
My style is natural, simple, and romantic. (Maybe?LOL)
 I highly suggest you learn about photography before study in newborn photography. And I am welcome parents or someone who interested in baby photography to subscribe to this channel.
I cannot wait to share with you more about my knowledge.

拍攝時主要用到的器材：
1. A7C 輕便全片幅相機| ILCE-7C/ILCE-7CL
2. Lens Sonnar T* FE 55mm F1.8 ZA
3. Lens FE 28mm F2
4. Lens FE 24-70mm F2.8 GM
5. lighting GODOX AD600 Pro
6. Godox 神牛X1
7. Godox 神牛V350 S Sony TTL 鋰電機頂閃光燈
8. For Newborn  Sigma 70mm F2.8 DG Macro 

「Hello I am Kiu Yip, someone may call me Q姐姐. My channel is mostly about what a photographer does in BTS. I am glad to have this chance to stand here for sharing newborn baby photography tips. 」


www.kiuyip.com
instagram: kiuyip.photo
